resources.string: A free notes app to store text, such as emails and password, life quotes, etc.
You can enable and add PIN so that any phone intruder will not be able to access your notes.
You might want to also enable fingerprint login to avoid exposing your PIN to anyone around you in public places
Allows user to open notes using fingerprint saved in this device
Enable the 4 Digit PIN combination to safeguard your notes
Disable the 4 Digit PIN combination to safeguard your notes
It\'s Empty \n\nNotes you created will appear here
It\'s Empty \n\nTrashed notes will appear here

The app My Notes for android does not communicate with any server for fetching your saved notes and other activities done inside the app. The author himself does not collect any data of any kind inside and outside of My Notes app. Any loss or damage in the notes herein is not shouldered by the author of this app.
